definition: Your innate “super-sense,” derived from the Tone of the Design Sun/Earth, selecting one of six sensory modalities (Smell, Taste, Outer Vision, Inner Vision, Feeling, Touch). This sense functions as an inner compass, guiding what “feels right.”
role_in_manifestation: Existence as Vibration and Flow: Cognition tunes you to subtle vibrational cues in your environment, what smells, looks, or feels aligned, so you follow resonance rather than force. Tuning Over Forcing: Acting on your super-sense feels effortless; it prevents distortion by anchoring choices in what “resonates true.” Nonlinear Causality: Your primary sense often delivers nonverbal downloads of possibilities before they materialize. The Directive: Use your strongest sense as an instrument of alignment, attune to its signals, then allow manifestation to unfold.

definition: A heightened olfactory sense guiding decisions by how things “smell” energetically, what feels nourishing or toxic.
role_in_manifestation: Quickly filters environments and choices by resonance; you follow what “sniffs” true.

definition: A gustatory-based inner compass, sensing whether information or input “tastes” right on the energetic palate.
role_in_manifestation: Allows discrete differentiation; you gravitate toward experiences that align with your vibrational “flavor.”

definition: An expansive, wide-angle visual awareness of surroundings, taking in the big picture at a glance.
role_in_manifestation: Sees all potentialities simultaneously, enabling you to align with the field en masse rather than fixating on details.

definition: A focused, tunnel-vision sight, seeing possibilities and patterns internally without external stimuli.
role_in_manifestation: Tunes you into inner images of potential futures; you manifest by holding these clear inner “visions.”

definition: A kinesthetic, somatic sense, an inner “felt sense” guiding you by mood, sensation, or emotional tone.
role_in_manifestation: Calibrates frequency through bodily resonance; you follow what “feels” coherent at a cellular level.

definition: A tactile filter, sensing texture and form, what you can “touch” energetically or physically as true.
role_in_manifestation: Grounds you in concrete reality; you test alignment by what you can tangibly engage or manipulate.
